name: Potions o' Potent
description:
Play as the local potions merchant, aiding everyday citizens with your finest brews!

With your trusty owl to ferry letters and potions, go wild making the greatest potions

the townspeople have ever seen!

~CONTROLS~

[LMB Drag] ingredients into the cauldron to mix into your lovely potion brew!

[Left click] envelopes to view the letters and deduce what your potion needs to cure the customer's ailments!

[LMB Drag] envelopes to move them around!

Ready to send off your potion?

[LMB Drag] from the Cauldron to fill up a sample, and drop onto

the corresponding envelope of the request you want to fulfill!

Look out for green stamped letters, as they'll tell you how much

the customer liked your potion!

No need to ever empty the magic cauldron - just keep adding ingredients and it'll change to match what you put it in!

Too many green letters cluttering up your screen?

[LMB Drag] an already-viewed green envelope into the fire to dispose of it!
